import { Outlet } from 'react-router-dom'; import PropTypes from 'prop-types'; import { RoutesStyled, List } from './ThemeSwitcher.styled'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import Button from '@mui/material/Button'; import { themeContext } from '../context/authContext'; import { btnStyles, ButtonStyled } from './globalStyles'; export const Layout = ({ children }) => { return ( {({mainTheme}) => { const {colors} = mainTheme; return (
Counter SignupForm ColorPicker Clock News Video Reader {children}
)}} ); }; Layout.propTypes = { children: PropTypes.node.isRequired, }
